name: reactions
description: React to every message in a channel with specific reactions
notTextChannel: <#{{channel}}> is not a text channel or i can't reach it (Check my permissions)
noReactions:
I can't add ({{emojis}}) in <#{{channel}}>
 Check my permissions and make sure that you entered real emojis
maxReactions: You can't add more than 5 reactions

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel to add auto reactions in

emojis.name: emojis
emojis.description: Emojis to react with, maximum 5 emojis

reset.name: reset
reset.description: Reset auto reactions for a channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel to reset auto reactions in
